title: VDC Deployment
description: Elements needed to build a VDC
acceptancecriteria: All features should be completed before the epic completion is accepted

title: Azure Identity - Connectivity
description: Ensure best practices are being followed for Identity and sync activities to on-prem
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Validate AD Connect and sync settings
description: Validate AD Connect settings
acceptancecriteria: Configuration validation:  Ensure that AD Connect is using 10M best practices

title: Azure Identity - Extend
description: Extend on-prem Identity into Azure (if required)
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update Windows Domain Controller template
description: Create a templated deployment for Windows Domain Controller
acceptancecriteria: Create and update Windows Domain Controller  template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy Domain Contoller into targeted Azure regions
description: Deploy Domain Controller workload through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Windows Domain Contollers that meets  Customer standards - per region

title: Cloud Design
description: Design sessions are meant to capture the key design decisions and requirements across the primary VDC disciplines.  These decisions will guide the VDC deployment.
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Cloud Design Session - Identity Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Identity
acceptancecriteria: On-site design session complete

title: Identity Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Identity
acceptancecriteria: Initial design strategy document for Identity created, based on design session and 10M best practices

title: Identity Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Identity strategy
acceptancecriteria: 10M and Customer review of strategy document

title: Identity Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Identity strategy document
acceptancecriteria: Updated and finalized Identity strategy document provided to the Customer

title: Cloud Design Session - Operational Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Operations
acceptancecriteria: On-site design session complete

title: Operational Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Operations
acceptancecriteria: Initial design strategy document for Operations created, based on design session and 10M best practices

title: Operational Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Operations strategy
acceptancecriteria: 10M and Customer review of strategy document

title: Operational Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Operations strategy document
acceptancecriteria: Updated and finalized Operational strategy document provided to the Customer

title: Cloud Design Session - Organizational Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on the Organization
acceptancecriteria: On-site design session complete

title: Organizational Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Organizational layout
acceptancecriteria: Initial design strategy document for Organizational layout created, based on design session and 10M best practices

title: Organizational Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Organizational strategy
acceptancecriteria: 10M and Customer review of strategy document

title: Organizational Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Organizational strategy document
acceptancecriteria: Updated and finalized Organization strategy document provided to the Customer

title: Cloud Design Session - Workload Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Workloads
acceptancecriteria: On-site design session complete

title: Workload Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Workloads
acceptancecriteria: Initial design strategy document for Workloads created, based on design session and 10M best practices

title: Workload Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Workload strategy
acceptancecriteria: 10M and Customer review of strategy document

title: Workload Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Workload strategy document
acceptancecriteria: Updated and finalized Workload strategy document provided to the Customer

title: Cloud Design Session - Network Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Network
acceptancecriteria: On-site design session complete

title: Network Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Network
acceptancecriteria: Initial design strategy document for Network created, based on design session and 10M best practices

title: Network Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Network strategy
acceptancecriteria: 10M and Customer review of strategy document

title: Network Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized network strategy document
acceptancecriteria: Updated and finalized Network strategy document provided to the Customer

title: Operations - Update Management
description: Update management via Azure updates
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy and Configure Azure Automation Account
description: Deploy and configure an Azure Automation account (w/ RunAs abiltiy)
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Azure automation accounts - per region and per 10M best practices

title: Configure Azure Update management
description: Configure Azure update solution
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Azure update solution

title: Operations - Monitoring
description: Monitoring component deployments and configurations
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update base monitoring dashboards
description: Create and update a base monitoring dashboard that is templatized
acceptancecriteria: Create and update base monitoring dashboard template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy base monitoring dashboards
description: Deploy base monitoring dashboards to centralized dashboard resource group
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  base monitoring dashboard

title: Operations - Log Analytics
description: Log Analytics collects and provides near realtime data that can feed alerts/monitors and provide insight to the health of your Azure deployment
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy Log Analytics
description: Deploy Log Analytics
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  A centralized Log Analytics workspace

title: Configure Network Monitor
description: Configure the Network monitoring Log Analytics solution
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Configuration of Network monitor - Azure to Azure networks and Azure to on-prem.  TCP or UDP (TCP requires firewall changes)

title: Deploy base monitoring solutions
description: Deploy 10M recommended Log Analytics solutions
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Azure Backup, ADReplication, AntiMalware, AgentHealthAssessment, Azure Activity, AzureApplicationGateway, AzureNSGAnalytics, KeyVaultAnalytics, NetworkMonitoring, Updates

title: Configure base monitoring solutions
description: Configure where necessary the base monitoring solutions
acceptancecriteria: Configuration of the log analytics solutions - 10M recommended

title: Operations - Alerts
description: Alerts - Define alerting criteria and create base alerting framework
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy and Configure Azure Alert Groups
description: Create Azure Alert groups
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Azure alert groups per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Operations - Backup
description: Enable Azure backup by default and ensure that the necessary infrastructure is in place to leverage it.
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update Recovery services vault template
description: Create a templated deployment for a Recovery Services Vault
acceptancecriteria: Create and update Recovery Services Vault template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy Centralized Recovery Services vault (per region)
description: Deploy Recvovery Services Vault through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Recovery Services Vault(s) - per design and region

title: Create template to enable backups on VM
description: Create a templatized method to enable backups on VM's
acceptancecriteria: Deployment method:  Template method to enable backups on VM's

title: Create template to setup backup policies
description: Create a templatized method to build a backup policy
acceptancecriteria: Deployment method:  Template method to create backup policies within a Recovery Services Vault

title: Azure Governance - Cloud Admin
description: Cloud Admin resources are centralized resources that are leveraged by shared services and across subscriptions
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy and Configure Cloud Admin Keyvault
description: Create centralized keyvaults (in each region) per 10M best practices
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Regional keyvault to contain encryption keys and/or secrets, passwords.  Configuration also includes enabling access policies, diagnostic logging and firewalls

title: Deploy and Configure Central Cloud Admin storage account
description: Createc centralized storage accounts per 10M best practices
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  1. Centralized storage account that can be leveraged for boot diagnostics, additional logging, etc.  2. Centralized storage account that can be used to store scripts, files, etc that are used by the cloud team

title: Azure Governance - Subscription Alignment
description: Ensure that all subscriptions within the Azure deployment are following 10M best practices and are aligned
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Deploy Subscriptions
description: Based on the design sessions, follow the subscription layout created.
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Subscriptions with the appropriate setup

title: Resource provider registration
description: Enable appropriate resource providers per subscription
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure: Appropriate Resource providers are registered within each subscription

title: Configure Activity Log
description: Enable and configure activity log per subscription following 10M best practices
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Activity log enabled and configured to 10M best practices - per subscription

title: Create Activity Log profile
description: Create Activity log profile per subscription following 10M best practices
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Log profiles should be set for each subscription.  Activity logs should be sent to both Log Analytics as well as a centralized storage account for X # of days as necessary for compliance

title: Validate subscription RBAC
description: Validate users in the top-level subscription roles.  Enable inheritance
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Owner, Contributor, etc roles should be validated and inheritance should be enabled

title: Azure Governance - Security Center
description: Based on design sessions and security/compliance requirements, configure Security Center order to meet organizational needs
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy and Configure Security Center
description: Enable Security Center
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure: 1. Security Center standard is enabled for each subscription 2. Configure Security Center settings within each subscription to match 10M best practices or meet organizational needs

title: Azure Governance - Policy
description: Based on design sessions and security/compliance requirements, configure Azure policy in order to meet organizational needs
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy and Configure Azure Policy Center (base policies)
description: Configure Azure Policy Center
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Security Center Policy (ASC), SKU size policy, Region deployment policy, Required tags policy

title: Azure Workloads - Linux
description: Linux workload development - this feature should translate the customer's Linux standards to Azure
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update Linux workload template
description: Create a templated deployment for a Linux workload
acceptancecriteria: Create and update Linux template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy Linux workload
description: Deploy Linux workload through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  A Linux workload that meets Customer standards

title: Azure Workloads - Windows
description: Windows workload development - this feature should translate the customer's Windows standards to Azure
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update Windows workload template
description: Create a templated deployment for a Windows workload
acceptancecriteria: Create and update Windows template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy Windows workload
description: Deploy Windows workload through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  A Windows workload that meets Customer standards

title: Azure Workloads - SQL IaaS
description: SQL workload development - this feature should translate the customer's SQL IaaS standards to Azure
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update SQL IaaS workload template
description: Create a templated deployment for a SQL IaaS workload
acceptancecriteria: Create and update SQL template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy SQL IaaS workload
description: Deploy SQL IaaS workload through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  A SQL IaaS workload that meets Customer standards

title: Azure Workloads - SQL PaaS
description: SQL PaaS workload development - this feature should translate the customer's SQL standards to Azure (PaaS)
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update SQL PaaS workload template
description: Create a templated deployment for a SQL PaaS workload
acceptancecriteria: Create and update SQL PaaS template per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy SQL PaaS workload
description: Deploy SQL PaaS workload through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  A SQL PaaS instance that meets  Customer standards

title: Azure Workloads - Web and App
description: Web/App workload development - this feature should translate the customer's Web/App/DB standards to Azure
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create and Update Web and App workload  pattern template
description: Create a templated deployment for a web/app/db pattern
acceptancecriteria: Create and update Nested templates for Web/App pattern per 10M best practices and Customer standards

title: Deploy Web and App workload
description: Deploy Web/App/DB pattern through template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  A web/app workload - this should include app components that are necessary for the application to function

title: Azure Networking - Core
description: Core networking elements for the Azure deployment
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Lock HVA (Network)
description: Locks should be applied to high value assets - ie. vNets, load balancers, app gateways and other critical network assets
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Read only locks (following naming standard) to all HVAs

title: Deploy Core Network
description: Core network consists of vNet's, shared service subnets, peering,etc
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Core networking described in the Cloud worksheet

title: Deploy and Configure DMZ
description: DMZ networking compontents (if needed)
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  DMZ networks and routing if needed

title: Azure Networking - Security
description: Secure Azure networking assets and adopt a security first posture in regards to its components
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Deploy and Configure NSG
description: NSG deployments should protect internet facing
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  NSGs deployed per 10M best practices or organizational need

title: Azure Networking - Services
description: Azure networking services include loadbalancers, app gateways, etc
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Create Azure loadbalancer template
description: Create a templated deployment for an Azure load balancer
acceptancecriteria: Create and update load balancer templates per 10M best practices

title: Create Azure Application Gateway template
description: Create a templated deployment for an Application Gateway
acceptancecriteria: Create and update application gateway templates per 10M best practices

title: Deploy Loadbalancer(s)
description: Leverage template(s) for deployment
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Load Balancers per design

title: Deploy Application Gateway(s)
description: Leverage template(s) for deployment
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Application Gateways per design

title: Deploy NVA
description: Work with customer team to deploy 3rd party NVA (if needed
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Base NVA

title: Configure NVA
description: Provide guidance to networking team where needed
acceptancecriteria: Aid customer networking team with Azure specific questions issues

title: Azure Networking - Connectivity
description: Connectivity from Azure to on-prem networks as well as connectivity to Azure services through the Azure backplane
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Enable Service Endpoints
description: Enable service endpoints in the appropriate networks/subnets
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure: Agreed upon Service Endpoints per subnet ie. Storage, SQL, Keyvault. Etc

title: Create and Update VPN template
description: Update VPN template to match customer needes
acceptancecriteria: Create and update Azure VPN template per design

title: Deploy Azure VPN
description: Deploy VPN template
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Standard VPN in each shared service hub (per region)

title: Validate Connectivity
description: Work with customer networking team to validate network connectivity
acceptancecriteria: Deployed to Azure:  Validate that on-prem to azure connectivty is functioning

title: Validate Networking equipment
description: Work with customer team to ensure that networking equipment is able to connect to Azure through VPN
acceptancecriteria: Documentation Provided: Ensure that on-prem network stack meets requirements

title: VDC Handoff
description: Ensure best practices are being followed for Identity and sync activities to on-prem
acceptancecriteria: All stories should be completed before the Feature completion is accepted

title: Transition Support to 10M Manged Services
description: Formal handoff to Managed Services for continued support activity
acceptancecriteria: All documentation and customer onboarding/introductions should be handed off to the the Managed Services lead

title: Review Deliverables with Customer
description: Review sesssion with the customer
acceptancecriteria: All documentation provided as well as an inventory of deliverables

title: Code handoff to Customer
description: Provide code repo to customer
acceptancecriteria: Scripts, templates, etc delivered
